translation:
The citizen Antônio José de Abreu states that it is necessary for the respective clerk, in view of the records of the gathering of the assets of the deceased intestate José Augusto Ledek, to provide him with a certificate of the decree in which the Petitioner was appointed Guardian of the estate of that deceased person, the day, month, and year in which he took the oath, as well as the day and year when those assets were deposited in the hands of Major Bernardo Pires, and finally the decree by which the Petitioner was relieved of the position of Guardian.

He requests from Your Honor

No. 2 The citizen Antônio Belarmino Ribeiro, Clerk of Orphans and Absentees of the city of Piratini and its jurisdiction. In virtue of the aforementioned decree: I certify that the assets referred to by the petitioner were deposited in the possession of the citizen Major Bernardo Pires on the twenty-fourth of September of the past month, as stated in the records on page eleven. I further certify, and it is stated in the same records on page fourteen, that the petitioner was appointed Guardian and took the oath on the twenty-fifth of the mentioned month of September. Finally, I certify that from the aforementioned records on page twenty-one recto, it is noted that the petitioner was relieved of such guardianship on the first of this current month of October, and replaced by the aforementioned citizen Major Bernardo Pires.
